title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' or just returning a null result set, the software behaves incorrectly or unexpectedly. An error message should be displayed instead.
OB: The software does not handle invalid filter expressions correctly or provide any error message.
EB: When setting an invalid filter expression or returning a null result set, the software should display a relevant error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set the filter expression 'row[0] equals to 0' or return a null result set. 
2. Observe that there is no relevant error message or handling in the software.
